h2_title: Daoist Mi Boss Fight and Guide
content: While most of their basic attacks are simple two-hit strikes, they can also start a combo with an upward slice creating a projectile wave, dash forward into a lunging strike, before spinning to perform a horizontal sweep with one last projectile wave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi', specifically from the subsection 'Daoist Mi Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
While most of their basic attacks are simple two-hit strikes, they can also start a combo with an upward slice creating a projectile wave, dash forward into a lunging strike, before spinning to perform a horizontal sweep with one last projectile wave.
